instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-8435: What is 820-8435? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.820-3427: What is 820-3427? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-8435</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - orientation of clock-chip
threads.message:
Hi

can anyone share the orientation of the clock-chip on the <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-8435</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> board?  Or a datasheet for the chip (SLG3NB148CV)?  

thanks
Justin 

p.s. yes -- took the thing off, stopped for a cup of tea and then realised i didn't make a note.  and matching the dot with pin 1 on the boardview just doesn't look right in my memory!

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-8435</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - orientation of clock-chip
threads.message: The dot should face pin 1, so on this one, the dot should face top left

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-8435</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - orientation of clock-chip
threads.message:
top left is an ambiguous concept here John!   

but if there is confidence in the dot and confidence in the boardview pin 1 notation then I guess that it's my mind playing tricks on me and the chip is oriented correctly.  It look jarringly wrong vis a vis my memory of when I removed it.

As luck would have it I got a very similar board (<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3427</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A) in the door 20 minutes ago, so I will cross-fingers and hope that it has a similar component set for RTC and double check against that! 

thanks

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-8435</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - orientation of clock-chip
threads.message: The dot on the chip should match pin 1 on the board view.
